ValidationRule.description: What they need to do before they can select the data gathering stage
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Advice_Status__c, "Setup")), OR( ISPICKVAL(Update_valuations__c,""), ISPICKVAL(New_LOAs_required__c,""), ISPICKVAL(New_or_existing_client__c,"") ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You need to complete the Setup section
